titleStmt.title: Dreadfull newes: or A true relation of the great, violent and late earthquake Hapned the 27. day of March, stilo Romano last, at Callabria, in the kingdome of Naples, about the houres of three and foure in the afternoone, to the over-throw and ruine of many cities, townes, and castles, and the death of above fifty thousand persons. With the names of the principall of the sayd cities, townes and castles, destroyed by the said earthquake, according to the originall printed and published by authority at Venice. Published with license and authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for R. Mab,

notesStmt.note: Variant: an earlier state; imprint has "Mabb"; part of heading on A2r and all of the page numbers in another setting.
Identified as STC 19229 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
